poem:
Title: "Reflections 'Neath the Mirrored Ark"

In Rotterdam's heart, steel and glass abide,
A mirrored ark amidst the rising tide.
An Escher dream, a conundrum of the mind,
Humanity in labyrinthine twist entwined.

Revel in vision from below and above,
In obscurity's grasp, the past unwove.
Objects of time, in present's clutch appear,
Pagans to progress, caught in the mirror.
